text:
@kylegriffin1 Trump on the coronavirus: 

Feb 25: "We're very close to a vaccine"

Feb 26: "You have 15 cases, and within a couple of days the 15 will be down to close to zero"

Feb 28: It's going to disappear. One day, it's like a miracle, it will just disappear

Get real @PressSec McEnany
